app.title: AxiomFlow - PDF Math Document Translation & Typesetting Tool

landing.title: PDF Math Document Translation & Typesetting Tool
landing.description: Intelligently recognizes LaTeX / MathType formulas, preserves layout and numbering, and reduces manual proofreading time.
landing.flowDescription: Roughly 3 steps: upload PDF → auto-parse formulas, figures and structure → export / edit a reusable typeset result.
landing.uploadInstruction: Drag your PDF into the area below, or click the card to start parsing and translation.
landing.dragPdf: Drag a PDF here, or click the card to choose a file
landing.orClick: Drag & drop or click to upload and see parsing in seconds
landing.fileTypeHint: Only PDF files are supported. Original exported PDFs are recommended for best results.
landing.fileSizeHint: Maximum file size: 50MB. For larger files, consider splitting and uploading separately.
landing.loginRequiredHint: Note: Uploading requires login so we can save your parsing progress and projects.
landing.privacyHint: Privacy: Your files are only used for parsing and translation, never for model training or sharing with third parties.
landing.firstVisitHintBody: You can click “Try Demo Project” first to experience the full workspace with a read-only sample, without uploading any files. The sample document is for demo only and will not be written into your account data.
landing.dragHint: PDF detected. Release the mouse to start upload and parsing.
landing.errorHelpLink: Having issues? Go to Help Center to see common questions.
landing.errorFileTypeHelp: Need to convert? View help documentation
landing.errorFileTooLargeHelp: File is large. Consider splitting into multiple PDFs and uploading separately. Online PDF splitter tools are recommended.
landing.helpFixedHint: If parsing fails, you can go to “Settings > Help” to view the guide and common issues.
landing.keyboardHint: Keyboard users can press Tab to focus the upload area below, then press Enter to select a file or use drag & drop.
landing.firstUseHint: First time? Click here to upload your first PDF
landing.uploadingToWorkspace: Redirecting to workspace, file is ready
landing.featureFormulaDesc: Automatically recognizes LaTeX, MathType and other math formulas
landing.featureLayoutDesc: Intelligently preserves layout structure and numbering, reducing manual proofreading
landing.featureMultiLangDesc: Supports translation in 10+ languages including Chinese, English, Japanese
landing.idleHelpText: Need help? You can start with the usage guide.
landing.trustSubtitle: Built for demanding research, teaching and publishing scenarios, with a focus on math-heavy layout quality.
landing.privacyModalDesc: We only keep your documents for as long as needed to provide translation and typesetting, and we do not use them to train general-purpose models.
landing.privacyModalItemRetention: Retention: documents are stored so you can edit and export projects, and can be deleted at any time from the workspace.
landing.privacyModalItemTraining: No model training: your documents are not used as generic model training data.
landing.privacyModalItemDeletion: One-click deletion: once you delete a project, the related documents are removed from our systems.
landing.privacyModalAction: Go to Settings & Help to learn more
landing.previewSectionTitle: What the translated layout roughly looks like
landing.previewSectionSubtitle: Keep math structure intact while preserving equation numbers, cross-references and section hierarchy.
landing.flowStep1Desc: Upload your PDF (drag & drop or click to select)
landing.flowStep2Desc: Automatically detect formulas, figures and document structure
landing.flowStep3Desc: Review and translate in the workspace
landing.demoTextLink: Not ready to upload? View the demo workspace first
landing.secondaryBestPracticeLink: See best practices for better parsing

workbench.sourcePdfHint: The source PDF will appear after the document is loaded.
workbench.translatedPdfHint: No translated PDF yet. Click “Translate & export PDF” in the top-right. The source PDF will load first, and the translated PDF will show here once generated.
workbench.demoBannerTitle: You are viewing a demo project
workbench.demoBannerDesc: This is a read-only example for showcasing the workspace. Any operations here will not be saved to your account.

dashboard.noDocumentsDesc: Upload your first PDF document to get started
dashboard.emailNotVerifiedDesc: Please verify your email address to unlock all features
dashboard.confirmDeleteDocumentMessage: Are you sure you want to delete document "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.confirmBatchDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected documents? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.batchDeleteFailedMessage: Batch delete failed, please try again later
dashboard.syncInProgressMessage: Parse results are not ready yet, please refresh later
dashboard.statusNotUpdatedMessage: Failed to get parse results, please retry or refresh status
dashboard.wsErrorMessage: Document real-time progress may not be updated, you can refresh later to check.
dashboard.wsConnectionFailedMessage: Document upload has started, but real-time progress connection was interrupted. You can refresh later to check status.
dashboard.verifyEmailFirstMessage: Unverified accounts cannot upload documents. Please verify your email address first.
dashboard.parsingTimeoutMessage: You can click "Refresh Status" or check progress later
dashboard.pendingUploadBanner: Importing “{filename}”. You can track upload and parsing progress in the list below.

securityGuide.title: Security Guide
securityGuide.description: For your account security, we recommend completing the following steps:

settings.title: Account settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account information and security settings
settings.accountInfoDesc: Manage your basic profile and email information
settings.emailUnverifiedDesc: Email is not verified. Some security operations will be limited. Please verify as soon as possible.
settings.securityDesc: Protect your account with password, login history and session management
settings.changePasswordTipNoPassword: This account cannot change password directly. Please use “Forgot password” to set a login password first.
settings.changePasswordTipEmailUnverified: Current email is not verified. Some security operations will be limited. Please verify your email.
settings.changePasswordModalSubtitle: Update your password regularly to keep your account secure.
settings.newPasswordPlaceholder: Enter a new password (at least 8 characters)
settings.loginHistoryModalSubtitle: View recent login records and handle anomalies promptly.
settings.loginHistoryTip: Supports filtering and search. We recommend reviewing abnormal logins regularly.
settings.noLoginRecords: No login records yet. Everything is normal.
settings.noLoginRecordsHint: If you find unfamiliar logins, go to "Active sessions" to revoke related devices.
settings.noMatchingRecordsHint: Try adjusting filter conditions or search keywords.
settings.sessionsModalSubtitle: Manage logged-in devices and revoke unrecognized sessions.
settings.sessionsTip: We recommend checking regularly and closing unrecognized device logins.
settings.noMatchingSessionsHint: Try adjusting filter conditions or search keywords.
settings.avatarModalSubtitle: Upload and adjust your avatar. Square images are recommended.
settings.avatarHelperText: The avatar will be cropped to a square from the center area, adapted for circular display.
settings.avatarUploadHint: We recommend clear square images. Supports JPG / PNG, max 2MB.
settings.avatarAdjustHint: You can drag the preview area to move the position, correct phone photo orientation or composition.

common.offline: You are currently offline, some features may be unavailable
common.onlineMessage: Your network connection has been restored

auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Please enter your email address, and we will send a verification code to your email.
auth.verificationCodeSent: Verification code has been sent to {email}, please enter the 6-digit verification code (letters + numbers, case-insensitive).
auth.loginUnlockDescription: Your account has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please enter the verification code to unlock.
auth.welcomeBackWith2FA: Welcome back, {name}! You've logged in via {method} + two-factor authentication.
auth.twoFactorAuthDescription: Your account has two-factor authentication enabled. Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app, or enter an 8-digit backup code.
auth.twoFactorAuthRequiredMessage: Your account has two-factor authentication enabled. Please enter the 2FA verification code to complete login.
